alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 12 at 7:13PM MST until December 14 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible for lower elevations. Southwest winds 45 to 55 mph with gusts to 75 mph possible in the mountains. * WHERE...Bighorn Mountains Southeast and Southern Johnson County. This includes Interstate 25. * WHEN...From 11 PM MST Monday to 11 PM MST Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Southeast Johnson County
